articles.description: Here, we take a look at the list of three talented Duleep Trophy performers who could make their India debut soon.
articles.content: Duleep Trophy 2023 ended with South Zone defeating West Zone in the final. It was after a few years that zone-based teams played against each other. This added context and perspective to the tourname… [+1509 chars]
